Level2.translation: The book is on the table.
The sun rises in the east.
There are stars in the sky.
There are animals in the forest.
Yesterday I had gone to school.
Last year I was not here.
Wake up early in the morning.
Worship is happening in the temple.
Give the answer to my question.
Love is a part of life.
He has a lot of strength.
The teacher is teaching a lesson.
The doctor is in the hospital.
Rice (uncooked) is available in the shop.
The car is in front of the house.
The tree is behind the house.
Don't walk in the middle of the road.
There are plants around the house.
She has a lot of work.
The snake is in the anthill.
The ant is going in a line.
How much is the price of this book?
That is big, this is small.
The pen has fallen under the table.
The sound of the bell was heard.

Level3.translation: The train arrived at the station.
The ship travels on the sea.
There are waves on the seashore.
The government works for the people.
The law is equal for everyone.
Justice should be available to everyone.
If you do wrong, you will be punished.
Festivals are part of our tradition.
Science is the reason for progress.
Technology has made our lives easier.
One should not forget the past.
Art gives joy to the mind.
I like to listen to music.
She has got a good job.
Agriculture is important to India's economy.
The farmer works in the field.
The crop has come well this year.
Serve the meal on the plate.
I have brought a gift for you.
The celebration was full of joy.
There is an annual program at the school.
An invitation for the wedding has come.
One should get blessings from elders.
Don't be sad, everything will be alright.
We must take the right decision.
What is the reason for this?
Change is constant in the world.
There is a solution to every problem.
We have got a good opportunity.
If you make an effort, success is definite.
My goal is to become a doctor.
One gets new experiences from traveling.
There are various types of fruits here.
I read the newspaper every day.
I watched a movie on television.
The light in the room is low.
It is difficult to walk in the dark.
The shape of the moon changes.
The size of this box is big.
What is the length of this rope?
The width of the road is sufficient.
The depth of the well is more.
There is a difference between these two.
